incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to O2 Networks in the United Kingdom

incident_updates.body: This SMS delivery delay is involving one customer and the customer will be contacted directly. We are resolving this incident.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Networks in United Kingdom for a subset of Short Codes and Alphanumeric. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Networks in United Kingdom for a subset of Short Codes and Alphanumeric. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays and delivery receipt failures when sending messages to O2 Networks in United Kingdom for a subset of Short Codes and Alphanumeric. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Programmable Voice Calls and Conferences Using DE1 Region was Degraded Between 15:33 - 15:52 Pacific Time on Aug 22, 2024

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice was degraded for 19 minutes between 15:33 - 15:52 Pacific Time on Aug 22, 2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced calls and conferences that may not have succeeded if using the de1 region, and established calls and conferences may have had degraded call quality. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Programmable Messaging was degraded due to a capacity constraint on Twilio's Toll-Free MMS peering partner connection.

incident_updates.body:
Twilio's Programmable Messaging was degraded from August 15 at 8:02 AM PT until August 22 at 12:50 AM PT. This was due to a capacity constraint on Twilio's Toll-Free MMS peering partner connection.  A small number of outbound Toll-Free MMS experienced failure error 30008. Twilio engineers collaborated with the partner to increase capacity and fully restore Toll-Free MMS traffic.
The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Subaccounts and Support Accounts Unable to View Console Usage Summary Page

incident_updates.body: Twilio Console was partially degraded for 15 minutes between 00:45 and 01:00 Pacific Time on 08/22/2024. During this period of time, certain users with the "Support" role or viewing the pages as a subaccount may have been unable to view the usage summary and subaccount usage summary pages. The issue has now been resolved.
